;;-----------------------------------------
# imageset 0 "black"
# imagealpha 0 0 0
# imagelayer 0 1
# imageset 1 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 1 0 0
# imagepos 1 0 0
# imagelayer 1 4
# imagescale 1 1.4 0
# imageset 2 "bg_white_circle"
# imagealpha 2 0 0
# imagepos 2 0 0
# imagelayer 2 5
# imagescale 2 1.5 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# envbody 11111 8 0
# effectpattern 11111 1 0
;;-----------------------------------------
# fadein "black" 2
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 3

# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
@
Phantom of the Kill
×
Brave Frontier

# se "SE_0014"
# fadein "white" 0.8
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
コラボ開催！

# alpha 101711 1 0.5
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 24
@
セレナ★6開放！
復刻開催のクエストをクリアして
ユニットを手に入れよう！

# face 101711 "happy"
# voice 1017 "selena_0041"
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 24
@
さらに
ブレフロ武具が★6強化可能に！

# fadein "white" 0.5
# alpha 101711 0 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 32
@
詳しくは
お知らせをチェック！

;;暗転挟む

# imagepos 0 0 30
# imageleftin 0 0.5

# background "wild"

# textwindow "nomal"

@

# textalign "center"

@

# face 102211 "smile"
# face 201511 "happy"
# face 301212 "happy"
# voice 1022 "rukina_0004"
# voice 2015 "miseru_0004"
# voice 3012 "lunaris_0004"

# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
@
ピックアップ7STEPガチャ
開催！

# se "SE_5535"
# fadein "white" 0.7
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30
@
STEP7で[FF0000]ブレフロコラボ
淘汰値５キラーズチケット[-]
プレゼント！！

# alpha 102211 0 0

# alpha 301212 0 0
# move 3101311 2 0
# mask 3101311 on
# alpha 3101311 1 0

# alpha 3200411 1 0
# face 3101311 "normal"
# face 3200411 "happy"
# voice 310131 "paracelsus_a_0004"

# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# textsize 30

クラスチェンジ素材を大量ゲット！
